resources.string:
Read and understand each question carefully and select your answer from the multiple-choice options.
 
Choose only one answer per question and click 'Next' to proceed to the next question.
 
You have a 3 minutes time limit per question.
 
Your score will display after answering all 15 questions. Good luck!

Read and understand each question carefully and select your answer from the multiple-choice options.
 
Choose only one answer per question and click 'Next' to proceed to the next question.
 
You have a 3 minutes time limit per question.
 
Your score will display after answering all 10 questions. Good luck!
